thread.title: BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Obtains A $350 Mln Unsecured Term Loan Under A Loan Agreement

title: BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Obtains A $350 Mln Unsecured Term Loan Under A Loan Agreement

organizations.name: loan under a loan agreement reuters staff

text:
April 16, 2018 / 8:32 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Pacific Gas And Electric Obtains A $350 Mln Unsecured Term Loan Under A Loan Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Pacific Gas and Electric Co: 
* PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC CO SAYS OBTAINED A $350 MILLION UNSECURED TERM LOAN UNDER A LOAN AGREEMENT - SEC FILING 
* PACIFIC GAS AND ELECTRIC CO - TERM LOAN MATURES ON APRIL 16, 2020, UNLESS EXTENDED Source : bit.ly/2JRRTBO Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
